info.title: Application General Resource Manager
info.description: Provides some interface about the application resources.

method.name: getRootFolder
method.description: Get the application root folder. Choose between

parameter.name: $mode
parameter.description: The file mode. See class constants for options. It is in account mode by default.

parameter.name: $shared
parameter.description: If set to true, it will return the shared root folder for applications. It is FALSE by default.

method.returndescription: The application root folder according to the given parameters.
